

/**************

DOCUMENTATION ON THE CREATION OF TEXT FILES ( USING THE FILE CLASS & PRINT WRITER CLASS ) 1.17.1

**************/



import java.io.File;
import java.io.IOException;
import java.io.PrintWriter;


public class MyClass {

    public static void main(String[] args) {
        // TODO Auto-generated method stub

        try {

            File myFirstFile = new File("FileCreation17.txt");

            if (myFirstFile.exists()) {

                myFirstFile.createNewFile();

            }

            PrintWriter contentsOfTheFile = new PrintWriter(myFirstFile);

            contentsOfTheFile.println("This prints the contents of the file that I have just created now.");

            contentsOfTheFile.println(2902918);

            contentsOfTheFile.close();

            System.out.println("The text file has successfully been created.");

        } catch (IOException ioError) {

            ioError.printStackTrace();

        }
       
    }

}



The text file has successfully been created.



/**************

DOCUMENTATION ON HOW TO READ FROM ANY FILE ( USING THE BUFFERED READER CLASS & FILE READER CLASS ) 1.17.2

**************/



import java.io.BufferedReader;
import java.io.FileReader;
import java.io.IOException;

public class MyClass {

    public static void main(String[] args) {
        // TODO Auto-generated method stub

        BufferedReader reader = null;

        try {
            
            reader = new BufferedReader(new FileReader("C:\\Users\\Temporary\\OneDrive\\Desktop\\pmm.html"));

            String line;

            while ((line = reader.readLine()) != null) {

                System.out.println(line);

            }

        } catch (Exception ioError) {

            // TODO: handle exception

            ioError.printStackTrace();

        } finally {

            try {

                reader.close();

            } catch (IOException error) {

                // TODO Auto-generated catch block

                error.printStackTrace();
            }

        }
       
    }

}
